articles.title: US drone strike kills Iran-backed militia leader in Baghdad - BBC.com
articles.description: The Pentagon says the Kataib Hezbollah leader was responsible for directing attacks on American forces.
articles.content:
By Orla Guerin & Hugo BachegaBBC News, Baghdad
Watch: BBC's Orla Guerin at site of US drone strike in Baghdad

articles.title: India Sees US As Weak, Doesn't Trust Americans To Lead: Nikki Haley - NDTV
articles.description: Aspiring Republican presidential candidate Nikki Haley on Wednesday said that India wants to be a partner with the US, but as of now they don't trust Americans to lead.
articles.content:
India has always played smart and stayed close with Russia, said Nikki Haley. (File)
